name: Hydrocis
overview: This Shareware brain basher is a very good one for those who love logical puzzles. How do you get 1,000 drops of water to go where you want them to go, with only 4 blockers and 1 blocker remover? This is a bit like Lemmings but the water element means the drops are not controllable. The shareware version stops after level 8, but the full game has 33 levels.
